name: Invasion (itch) (Fuzzymoth Games)
description:
Invasion is a sci-fi top-down bullet hell game in which you play as William, a young man whose entire village has been abducted by aliens.

Fight through waves of robots and defeat challenging bosses to make your way to the invader's spaceship and save your friends!

Featuring 5 areas, 13 bosses, a variety of enemies, and generic bullet hell mechanics, such as bullets, small lasers, big lasers, and giant mechs.

For those who want an extra challenge, there's also a much harder secret ending, if you can find it...

If you find a bug you want to report, or just want to hang out, you can join the Discord at https://discord.gg/UmPMGPn8cP.
